name: Big Buddha Rozi
Big Buddha Camilla orig. $40
description:
Go for the ultimate in cuteness when you carry Camilla wristlet, Just the right size to carry your essentials!

Polyurethane wallet with exaggerated stitching detail and cut-out design with metallic underlay. 

Zip around closure.

Detachable wrist strap.

Polished hardware with signature logo detail.

Lined interior with zippered currency compartment, slip pockets, and credit card slots.


POSTED: 8/23/13
REVIEWER: Leah from 
OVERALL: Rated:4 stars!
COMFORT: Rated:4 stars!
STYLE: Rated:4 stars!
Overall, this clutch is super cute. The only downside is that it doesn't have an optional strap or chain to wear as a crossbody bag, but I guess that's not the purpose of this! It is extremely roomy, tons of room for cards, cash, and a roomy spot for a cellphone! The leather is soft and easy to hold. Totally worth the money!

name: Big Buddha Kayla (Last One) sale price $41.00
description: Brighten your day or your evening with your essentials stylishly stowed in the Big Buddha Kayla. This elegant yet sturdy canvas bag, perfect for warm nights, is available in several colors and patterns and boasts a bold, all-over floral print pattern. It has a kiss lock closure and opens to reveal a satiny, fabric-lined interior with just enough room for your ID, cash, credit card, keys, lipstick, comb, cell phone, and anything other small necessities you simply can't leave home without. It has with a short, dressy chain strap as well as a crossbody chain strap, and the Big Buddha Kayla comes with a shiny, gold-toned hanging logo charm

With plenty of extra pockets and inside space, you'll be good to go for the day and night! Bring LUCY anywhere from the office, to the movies, to a nighttime hotspot.
